newsitem.title: INDIA: India RBI stops Global Finance taking deposits.
newsitem.headline: India RBI stops Global Finance taking deposits.

text.p: India's Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Saturday said it had prohibited Global Finance Corporation Ltd from accepting any deposits with immediate effect.
A press release from the central bank did not give any reasons for the action taken against the Calcutta-based firm.
The statement said the company had been directed not to enter into any business transactions without written permission of the RBI for a period of six months.
The Bombay Stock Exchange also said it was suspending trading in shares of Global Finance, with effect from June 9. Shares in the non-bank finance house were not actively traded.
